title: Government vs. Jobs | Guests: Daniel Suhr & Gov. Greg Gianforte | 4/26/21
description:
Glenn makes a definitive case that the Great Reset is far from a "conspiracy theory," and a scary step taken by the EU proves it’s approaching fast. A military fighter jet in California was allegedly put on alert at the height of the COVID restrictions. Police officers are leaving their jobs in record numbers, but amid the growing anti-police sentiment, can anyone say this comes as a surprise? Companies are doing everything they can to get people to return to work, but government welfare pays too well. Liberty Justice Center senior attorney Daniel Suhr joins with his solution to social justice warriors: "1A Warriors." Montana Gov. Greg Gianforte shares the steps he’s taking to protect the Second Amendment in his state.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
